page.title: 10TRADE
page.content:
{PENTON'S LEAMAN GARAGE}records good business and has done so for over 40 years. Mr Penton employs 7 people. They sell 100-150 gallons of petrol a day, that is about 600 gallons a week.
{PENTON'S HAULAGE BUSINESS.} This is quite a big business with the drivers travelling to places like { CROYDON.They are allowed to drive for 8 hours with 5 minutes breaks every hour.If they have to drive again they have to have 8 hours rest. The diesel tanks on Penton's lorries hold 80 gallons but they have a top tank as well so that they hold 180 gallons.On the 40 foot trailers you can get 20-22 pallets. The trailers travel to places all over England, Scotland and Wales. Mr Penton owns 6 trucks and employs 4 people and 2 part timers.
